thread.section_title: ZipRecruiter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ZipRecruiter | ziprecruiter.com | 4 of 197
thread.title: Maria Bompiani

author: Maria Bompiani
title: Maria Bompiani
text: I had three key positions in my company I needed filled immediately. The process of using ZipRecruiter was extremely easy. I worked with David setting up my account and job postings. I immediately received numerous candidates who actually met the position needs. When I filled the positions, Alice answered all of my questions and made the cancellation process very simple. I recommend ZipRecruiter to everyone!
